directions: Mix together cake mix, 1 box pudding mix, eggs, oil, and soda drink.  Stir in coconut and nuts if desired.  Pour into a greased 9 x 13 inch baking pan.
Bake at 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) for 35 to 40 minutes.  Cool.
Beat 1 box pudding and milk together.  Fold in whipped topping.  Frost cooled cake.  Keep refrigerated.
ingredients: 1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (3 ounce) package instant pistachio pudding mix
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
title: Watergate Cake III
